oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: David Stevenson Indiana's Roll of Honor and Patriotic Dead, with Biographical Sketches book proposal, 1863 March
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stevenson, David
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from David Stevenson to the People of Indiana soliciting accounts of Indiana's Civil War soliders for a book entitled "Indiana's Rolle of Honor and Patriotic Dead, with Biographical Sketches."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder correspondence and papers, 1865-1937
